amendment.description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in Part A of House Report 116-37 to find that annual FCC reports on the state of broadband deployment are important to fostering further deployment and that Congress relies on the accuracy of these reports.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Trone amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Trone amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Trone.
